p: Table 1 shows a summary of the different error estimates. The final error estimate for the climate-change–driven GMSL acceleration is the RSS of the measurement errors (0.011 mm/y 2), the error in the Pinatubo correction (0.01 mm/y 2), the error in the ENSO correction (0.01 mm/y 2), and the errors due to decadal variability (0.017 mm/y 2). Their joint consideration yields a final acceleration estimate of 0.084 ± 0.025 mm/y 2.
